resources.string: All measurements are in Feet and Inches within the slider calculator. Width is in feet and half feet (6 inches), Height is in Inches and half inches, and Slope is in Percent and tenths

Often the calculator will answer with something like 5.60 inches. You can adjust the slope slightly either side of 2.0, (1.9 and 2.1, and see what the hub depth reads, to help you decide if 5.5 or 5.75 is the number you would like to use.
